Module project
Package project.game

Class JSONTextManager

java.lang.Object
project.game.JSONTextManager
public class JSONTextManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class creates a Map of all Item descriptions in a level in its corresponding language DE/EN. It is used to create a text-popup to describe the item that has been clicked. The map is being parsed once the game has been started. You may want to retrieve the value text of an item key, or check if the map includes that key.
